oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Easter Parade in downtown Nashville, Tennessee, 1979
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A scene from the 1979 Easter Parade in downtown, Nashville. This festive springtime parade was enjoyed by many people, with its decorated parade floats, entertainers, and community participation. The event was organized by Kolleen Hudgins, Director of Special Events, under the administration of Mayor Richard Fulton. Forms part of the Kolleen Hudgins, Director of Special Events, Mayor’s Office Collection. 1 color photograph.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hudgins, Kolleen; Fulton, Richard
